title: Winter Sports
description: Have you ever gone sledding down a snow-covered hill? Have you ever been ice-skating on a frozen lake? Winter Sports is a colorful introduction to a variety of sports played during the winter. Detailed photographs and a repetitive text structure support students' learning as they make connections to prior knowledge and practice the skill of classifying information.
meta: climbing, ice hockey, skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, sports
Initial Consonants : Identify initial consonant s-blends

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
